channel.title: How do I change my mini game rewards [Delta (XScape)]
channel.description: I went through my Client.JAVA and could not find how to change my pest control rewards. Also I went through my Shops.CFG and didn't find the Barbarian Assault shop, where are these two things?

item.title: How do I change my mini game rewards [Delta (XScape)]
item.dc:creator: @ats3 ats3
item.description:
@ats3 wrote:

Assault Minigame Shop should be in shops.cfg, it should be shop number 19
-Edit-
Rewards can be found in clickingMost.java
Search for

c.pcPoints

Read full topic

item.description:
@Coder_Kieran wrote:

As for the assault one, im baffled unless its hidden in another folder?
